snippet: Jenkins, an inductee in the Motorsports Hall of Fame of America, helped lift the National Hot Rod Association from the streets to the professional track.
abstract: Bill Jenkins, an influential and revered figure in drag racing who helped lift the sport from the streets to the professional track while introducing a host of technical innovations, dies at age 81.
lead_paragraph: Jenkins, an inductee in the Motorsports Hall of Fame of America, helped lift the National Hot Rod Association from the streets to the professional track.

headline.seo: Bill Jenkins, 81, Drag Racing Driver and Innovator, Dies
headline.main: Bill Jenkins, 81, Drag Racing Driver and Innovator, Dies
